text: Héctor Ortega Gómez (12 January 1939 — 3 June 2020) was a Mexican actor. He was also a screenwriter and a director. He was born in Mexico City. His best known works were in Las fuerzas vivas, Santa sangre and in Lucía, Lucía. Ortega died on 3 June 2020 in Mexico City, aged 81.Muere el actor mexicano Héctor Ortega a los 81 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican screenwriters Category:Mexican movie directors Category:Writers from Mexico City Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Héctor Ortega
